body.section: Hierarchy FormalEducation is a kind of ProviderEducation

section.title: Description
section.p: Represents information about the formal educational experience of an Individual Healthcare Provider. See Section 2 of the CAQH Provider Application.

stentry.p: Indicates the degree or certificate earned by the provider. Examples include Bachelor of Science, Doctorate in Medicine.
Pointer to the Undergraduate or Professional School which the Individual Provider attended.
